t: Amazon closing Kennesaw warehouse which employs 219 workers | Local News | mdjonline.com
s: December 14, 2022 - Amazon will close its Kennesaw warehouse in April, according to a recent filing the company made with the Georgia Department of Labor. The warehouse employs 219 workers.
